RelatedSentence: It was a person close to the suspect who notified police about the presence of explosive materials in the family 's triplex .
Antunes - Barros was arrested downtown on Saturday several hours after police began its operation on Robertine Barry Street near Alice Nolin Street in Ahuntsic - Cartierville .
Specialists with the Montreal police used a bomb - defusing robot in the 15 - hour operation , during which a number of homes had to be evacuated .
